column2: **This update was generated by VSAC to align with code changes published by the code system of one or more member value sets.**
The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for encounters for an outpatient visit.
This value set may use a model element related to Encounter.
Includes concepts that represent an encounter for the comprehensive history, evaluation, and management of a patient presenting with minor to high severity problems.
Office visits, include weekend, after hours
